components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium nitrate
sample: 99 mass %(dried with chemical reagent;dried by vacuum heating)

ref.full: Bermejo, M. D.; Montero, M.; Saez, E.; Florusse, L. J.; Kotlewska, A. J.; Cocero, M. J.; van Rantwijk, F.; Peters, C. J. (2008) J. Phys. Chem. B 112(43), 13532-13541.
ref.title: Liquid[-Vapor Equilibrium of the Systems Butylmethylimidazolium Nitrate-CO2and Hydroxypropylmethylimidazolium Nitrate-CO2 at High Pressure: Influence of Water on the Phase Behavior
